name: Ecover Builder For Dummies
author: Miguel Martinez Lopez

sections.description:
Our ecover builder takes just a couple of minutes from start to finish. Simply select your desired mockup book, upload an image of your book cover and you are all set!

Our eCover builder is a perfect solution for those who cannot use Photoshop and are complete newbies in graphic design. No need to install bulky softwares nor spend a lot of time designing your 3D book. You no longer have to worry if it’s compatible with your graphics editor. We got your back!

It’s easy to use even if you’ve never designed anything in your life!

This really cool eCover software will quickly and easily transform your images into 3d eCovers that will make your website look like a million bucks! That’s just how easy it is to present your business and products in an attractive and professional manner.

Main Features

  • Drag and drop personalization of the placement of the cover on the mockup
  • Shortcode to show the 3D ecover in your posts and pages
  • Several white book mockups already included
sections.faq:
How to use this plugin?

The plugin adds a new menu entry to the wordpress admin panel to create, edit or delete ecovers.

To create a new ecover go to the ecover post type admin page. There you select a mockup and another image to cover part of the mockup. The user can use one of the provided mockups in the plugin or upload a new one from the media gallery. Adjust the positions of the images and drag the corners of the cover to the right positions to provide the right feeling of perspective. Once you are done save the ecover. Now you can use the ID of the ecover in the shortcode to show in any other page. For example, if the post type Ecover ID is 4, then use this shortcode to show the ecover:
[ecover id=”4]
